data.actual_result: It attempts to DM yourself. Of course it doesn't work, the error popping up is similar as described in this report : https://trello. com/c/FHtL3Ugn/
data.expected_result: Same expected behavior as when you tap your mention in chat: nothing
data.short_description: If you are mentionned in a channel topic, tapping your mention will attempt to DM yourself
data.steps_to_repro: - Put your mention in a channel topic - Tap on it in the member sidebar
